title: The Winter Groom
description: Curt Adler was told to take the young woman home. Nothing more. But when he sees her living conditions, he canâ€™t in good conscience leave her behind. Also, he might be falling in love with her.Demi has been left behind, forgotten, and tossed aside her whole life. But when Curt turns his protective gaze on her, all she wants to do is stay safe in his arms forever.Warning: Can the two of them keep their hands off each other? Why would you want them to!? Kick off this wintery mix of sugar and spice in Hollow Oak!
author: Alexa Riley
